original_text: Then the three mighty men broke through the camp of the Philistines and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem that was by the gate and took it and brought it to David. But David would not drink it. He poured it out to the Lord
korean_text: 이 세 사람이 블레셋 사람들의 군대를 돌파하고 지나가서 베들레헴 성문 곁 우물 물을 길어가지고 다윗에게로 왔으나 다윗이 마시기를 기뻐하지 아니하고 그 물을 여호와께 부어드리고

sentences.original_text: Then the three mighty men broke through the camp of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 세 용사가 블레셋 사람들의 진영을 뚫고 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem
But David would not drink it
He poured it out to the Lord
